item.title: Premium Plans
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded:
Gold Plan

Our gold scanner plan will perfectly highlight your trading style and bring you to success. With unlimited access to our over 40 email lists, in-depth stock look up, and personalized stock search, you will stay informed and in the action. If you are interested in elevating your positions, check out if our gold plan is right for you.

Buy Gold Plan

Silver Plan

Upon purchase of the silver scanner plan, you will receive access to unlimited access of our most popular email lists, stock lookup, and limited access to personalized stock search. With access to our tools you will receive an edge on the market at a practical price. If you are excited to further improve your trading, check out the silver plan.

Buy Silver Plan

item.title: Email Stock Lists
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded:
Our email stock lists will keep you informed and up to date on the changing market. Look below for all of our stock lists, chose your favorites and subscribe.

Popular Stock Lists
All Stock Lists
Frequently asked questions
Why am I not able to access all of the stock lists ?

If you are subscribed to the silver plan, then you will be unable to access the complete stock list until you upgrade your plan.

Will subscribing to a list spam my email ?

Our lists will only send you a email when a new stock passes, so depending on the list the volume of stocks that pass each thresh hold might be different, if quantity of emails is your concern then be careful when subscribing to a list.

How quickly will I be informed by this list ?

Our services scan every three minutes to keep subscribers informed.

item.title: All Stock Alerts
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded:
This is a complete set of our stock lists, these lists will email you when a specific action is met by any stock on the market. All of the information for each list will be included in its bio. This information includes but is not limited to, the frequency a stock reaches the threshold, the type and information about the list will all be included.
Percent Increase Lists 
These lists will keep you informed of movements in the market to keep you in the game. If a company is making gains in the market, momentum traders and day traders will find massive edge from the early information provided by these lists.
20% Price Increase Today
20% Up Today List
This threshold is reached when a stock is up twenty percent or more on the day. The average stock goes up or down on average of 4-5 percent everyday. A stock going up twenty percent happens multiple times everyday. This list should send a high amount of emails each day.
50% Price Increase Today
50% Up Today List
This threshold is reached when a stock is up fifty percent or more on the day. The average stock goes up or down on average of 4-5 percent everyday. If a stock goes up twenty percent it is accounted as an anomaly, stocks rarely reach that fifty percent so if you want to receive information on the top gainers add this stock list. The 50 percent list will more commonly send emails in the afternoon and should send a medium to high quantity of emails each day.
75% Price Increase Today
75% Up Today List
This list will send an email when a stock has gained at least seventy-five percent today. If you want only to receive notices about the top gainers each day then 75 percent list will be your go to. This list should send a small quantity of emails each day.
Percent Decrease Lists 
The percent down lists will provide an edge to traders using momentum to short sell or to stay alerted if a position is failing.
10% Price Decrease Today
10% Price Decrease Today
This threshold is reached when a stock is down ten percent or more on the day. The average stock goes up or down on average of 4-5 percent everyday. Stocks go up more than they go down on average. Ten percent down today will send a medium quantity of notifications each day.
15% Price Decrease Today
15% Down Today
This threshold is reached when a stock is down fifteen percent or more on the day. If the average stock goes down, it will lose on average between 2-20 percent everyday. Stocks go up more than they go down on average. Fifteen percent down today will send a low to medium quantity of notifications each day.
20% Price Decrease Today
20% Down Today
This threshold is reached when a stock is down twenty percent or more on the day. If the average stock goes down, it will lose on average between 2-20 percent everyday. Stocks go up more than they go down on average. Twenty percent down today will send a very low quantity of notifications each day.
Volume Today List 
These volume lists target any stock that is having a massive increase in volume presently. When a stock has a large increase in its volume over its average, then it indicates a large amount of volatility or change in the stock today which might be a large factor in picking stocks to active traders.
1.125 Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 1.125x Three Month Average 
This threshold is reached when a stock has 1.125 times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day.  This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should send a high quantity of emails each day.
1.25 Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 1.25x Three Month Average 
This threshold is reached when a stock has 1.25 times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day.  This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should send a high quantity of emails each day.
1.5 Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 1.5x Three Month Average 
This threshold is reached when a stock has 1.5 times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day.  This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should send a high to medium quantity of emails each day.
1.75 Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 1.75x Three Month Average 
This threshold is reached when a stock has 1.75 times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day.  This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should send a  medium quantity of emails each day.
Two Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 2x Three Month Average
This threshold is reached when a stock has two times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day. For example, if the three month average is twenty million then this list will inform you when this specific stock reaches forty million shares of volume. This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should send a medium to low quantity of emails each day.
2.5 Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 2.5x Three Month Average
This threshold is reached when a stock has 2.5 times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day.  This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should send a medium quantity to low of emails each day.
Three Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 3x Three Month Average
This threshold is reached when a stock has triple the volume of it's three month average or more on the day. For example, if the three month average is twenty million then this list will inform you when this specific stock reaches 60 million shares of volume. This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you . This list should be send a low quantity of emails each day.
Five Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume 5x Three Month Average
This threshold is reached when a stock has five times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day. For example, if the three month average is twenty million then this list will inform you when this specific stock reaches 100 million shares of volume. This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should send a low quantity of emails each day.
Earnings Per Share P/E 
The P/E ratio is a ratio of a stock price divided by the company's yearly earnings per share. The P/E becomes a measure of how many years it will take the investor to earn back their principal from the initial investment. This  becomes useful to know when a P/E of a stock increases making the time for your investment to mature longer. P/E can also indicate over evaluation, (the company is worth less than its market cap), for stocks with high P/E evaluations.
P/E Change 10 Percent Increase
P/E Increase 10% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E increased ten percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are becoming more overvalued or recording lower profits. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming overvalued before the price drops. This list should be send between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.
P/E Change 20 Percent Increase
P/E Increase 20% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E increased twenty percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are overvalued and/or recording lower profits that are becoming more overvalued. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming overvalued before the price drops. This list should be send between a medium to low frequency of emails each day.
P/E Change 30 Percent Increase
P/E Increases 30% In Three Months

This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E increased thirty percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are becoming grossly overvalued and/or their company is failing by not making money. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming overvalued before the price drops. This list should be send between a low frequency of emails each day.

If the P/E trends down for a company, this is a sign that the company is recording increasing profits or the price per share is dropping. This downturn if resulted from record profits might lead to an increase of the stock price, but if due to the price per share falling, indicates a stock pulling back from overvaluation or bad press.
P/E Change 10 Percent Decrease
P/E Decrease 10 % In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E decreases ten percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are becoming undervalued and/or recording higher profits that are becoming more valuable. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming worth or less risky to hold for a long time. This list should be send between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.
P/E Change 20 Percent Decrease
P/E Decrease 20% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E decreases twenty percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are undervalued and/or recording higher profits that are becoming more valuable. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming worth or less risky to hold for a long time. This list should be send between a medium to low frequency of emails each day.
P/E Change 30 Percent Decrease
P/E Decreases 30% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E decreases thirty percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are undervalued becoming more valuable and/or recording higher profits. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming worth or less risky to hold for a long time. This list should be send between a medium to low frequency of emails each day.
Market Cap 
The market cap of a stock is calculated by the amount of shares available multiplied by the price of each share. When the market cap of a company increases it takes a larger share of its industry, leading to it making more money, but companies with large market caps tend to grow less in a short term due to there being a sociological barrier when a stock's price increases a large amount.
Market Cap Increase Ten Percent
Market Cap Increase of 10% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock has a market cap increase of ten percent over the past three months. This targets companies that are growing in the market and might provide a strong growing investment for long term traders. When the market cap of a company increases, the probability of future increases by that company does as well. This list should be send between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.
Market Cap Increase Twenty Percent
Market Cap Increase of 20% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock has a market cap increase of twenty percent over the past three months. This targets companies that are growing in the market and might provide a strong growing investment for long term traders. When the market cap of a company increases, the probability of future increases by that company does as well. This list should be send between a medium to low frequency of emails each day.
Market Cap Increase Thirty Percent
Market Cap Increase of 30% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock has a market cap increase of thirty percent over the past three months. This targets companies that are growing in the market and might provide a strong growing investment for long term traders. When the market cap of a company increases, the probability of future increases by that company does as well. This list should be send between a low frequency of emails each day.
A market cap of a stock decreasing over the past three months is linked to losing traction in sales or more competitors entering the industry. With the market cap decreasing this might show an opportunity to short sell a company, or actively trade with increased volatility. Keep in mind with a smaller market cap stocks might prove to have more risk for long term traders.
Market Cap Decrease Ten Percent
Market Cap Decrease of 10% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock has a market cap decrease of ten percent over the past three months. This targets companies that are growing in the market and might indicate a decrease in the company or new competitors. When the market cap of a company decreases, the probability of future increases by that company decreases as well. This list should be send between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.
Market Cap Decrease Twenty Percent
Market Cap Decrease of 20% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock has a market cap decrease of twenty percent over the past three months. This targets companies that are growing in the market and might indicate a decrease in the company or new competitors. When the market cap of a company decreases, the probability of future increases by that company decreases as well. This list should be send between a medium to low frequency of emails each day.
Market Cap Decrease Thirty Percent
Market Cap Decrease 30% In Three Months
This threshold is reached when a stock has a market cap decrease of thirty percent over the past three months. This targets companies that are growing in the market and might indicate a decrease in the company or new competitors. When the market cap of a company decreases, the probability of future increases by that company decreases as well. This list should be send a low frequency of emails each day.
Daily Volume Over Shares Available 
The daily volume of a stock is a calculation of how many individual shares are being traded over the current day. Stocks have a total amount of shares that could ever be bought called the total shares available. When daily volume is divided by shares available, it shows how much volume there is compared to the amount that is possible. As demand is a key factor of the market, large profits are to be made with small cap stocks experiencing large amounts of daily volume.
50% Daily Volume Over Shares Available
50% Daily Volume Over Shares Available 
This threshold is reached when a stock has a daily volume over shares available equal to fifty percent. This targets companies that are experiencing more demand than supply in the market and might indicate a future increase in the company's stock price. When the daily volume over shares available of a company increases, the this indicates that there is a continuing demand for the stock and a small supply. This list should send a high frequency of emails each day.
100% Daily Volume Over Shares Available
100% Daily Volume Over Shares Available 
This threshold is reached when a stock has a daily volume over shares available equal to one hundred percent. This targets companies that are experiencing equal demand compared supply in the market and might indicate a future increase in the company's stock price. When the daily volume over shares available of a company increases, the this indicates that there is a continuing demand for the stock and a small supply. This list should send a high to medium frequency of emails each day.
150% Daily Volume Over Shares Available
150% Daily Volume Over Shares Available 
This threshold is reached when a stock has a daily volume over shares available equal to one hundred and fifty percent. This targets companies that are experiencing larger demand compared supply in the market and might indicate a future increase in the company's stock price. When the daily volume over shares available of a company increases, the this indicates that there is a continuing demand for the stock and a small supply. This list should send a medium to low frequency of emails each day.

item.title: Popular Stock Lists
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded:
This is a complete set of our most popular stock lists, these lists will email you when a specific action is met by any stock on the market. All of the information for each list will be included in its bio. This information includes but is not limited to, the frequency a stock reaches the threshold, the type and information about the list will all be included.
Percent Change Today Lists 
These lists will keep you informed of movements in the market to keep you in the game. If a company is making gains in the market, momentum traders and day traders will find massive edge from the early information provided by these lists.
20% Up Today
20% Up Today List
This threshold is reached when a stock is up twenty percent or more on the day. The average stock goes up or down on average of 4-5 percent everyday. A stock going up twenty percent happens multiple times everyday. This list should send a high amount of emails each day.
50% Up Today
50% Up Today List
This threshold is reached when a stock is up fifty percent or more on the day. The average stock goes up or down on average of 4-5 percent everyday. If a stock goes up twenty percent it is accounted as an anomaly, stocks rarely reach that fifty percent so if you want to receive information on the top gainers add this stock list. The 50 percent list will more commonly send emails in the afternoon and should send a medium to high quantity of emails each day.

The percent down lists will provide an edge to traders using momentum to short sell or to stay alerted if a position is failing.

10% Down Today
10% Down Today
This threshold is reached when a stock is down ten percent or more on the day. The average stock goes up or down on average of 4-5 percent everyday. Stocks go up more than they go down on average. Ten percent down today will send a medium quantity of notifications each day.
15% Down Today
15% Down Today
This threshold is reached when a stock is down fifteen percent or more on the day. If the average stock goes down, it will lose on average between 2-20 percent everyday. Stocks go up more than they go down on average. Fifteen percent down today will send a low to medium quantity of notifications each day.
Volume Today List 
Volume is a measure of shares that change hands in a time period. For these lists there is a set range of stocks that fit in the criteria for each list, this will limit the spam from large stocks like nvidia that can easily reach two hundred million shares every day due to its popularity.
Ten Million Volume Today
Ten Million Shares of Volume Today
This threshold is reached when a stock has ten million shares in volume or more on the day. This stock list will only send emails for stocks priced under 100 and a three month average volume of less than 8 million. This targets small companies that are having a day spike or increase these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher likely hood of increase. If you are not a active trader this list might not benefit you and you might try another list for higher volume. This list should be sent between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.
Twenty Million Volume Today
Twenty Million in Volume Today
This threshold is reached when a stock has twenty million shares in volume or more on the day. This stock list will only send emails for stocks priced under 100 and a three month average volume of less than 12 million, but more than 5 million. This targets small to medium companies that are having a day spike or increase these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher likelihood of increase. If you are not a active trader this list might not benefit you and you might try another list for higher volume. This list should be sent between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.
Fifty Million Volume Today
Fifty Million Shares in Volume Today
This threshold is reached when a stock has fifty million shares in volume or more on the day. This stock list will only send emails for stocks priced under 150 and a three month average volume of less than 35 million, but more than 15 million. This targets small to medium companies that are having a day spike or increase these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher likelihood of increase. If you are not a active trader this list might not benefit you and you might try another list for higher volume. This list should be sent between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.
These volume lists target any stock that is having a massive increase in volume presently. When a stock has a large increase in its volume over its average, then it indicates a large amount of volatility or change in the stock today which might be a large factor in picking stocks to active traders.
Two Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume Two Times Larger Than Three Month Average
This threshold is reached when a stock has two times the volume of it's three month average or more on the day. For example, if the three month average is twenty million then this list will inform you when this specific stock reaches forty million shares of volume. This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you. This list should  send a high to low quantity of emails each day.
Three Times Three Month Average Volume
Daily Volume Three Times Larger Than Three Month Average
This threshold is reached when a stock has triple the volume of it's three month average or more on the day. For example, if the three month average is twenty million then this list will inform you when this specific stock reaches 60 million shares of volume. This targets fast moving stocks today, these stocks are better for active traders because they have a higher volatility. If you are not an active trader this list might not benefit you . This list should be send a medium to low quantity of emails each day.
Earnings Share P/E

The P/E ratio is a ratio of a stock price divided by the company's yearly earnings per share. The P/E becomes a measure of how many years it will take the investor to earn back their principal from the initial investment. This becomes useful to know when a P/E of a stock increases making the time for your investment to mature longer. P/E can also indicate over evaluation, (the company is worth less than its market cap), for stocks with high P/E evaluations.

P/E Change 10 Percent Increase
P/E Increase Ten Percent In Three Months

This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E increased ten percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are becoming more overvalued or recording lower profits. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming overvalued before the price drops. This list should be sent between a medium to high frequency of emails each day.

P/E Change 20 Percent Increase
P/E Increase Twenty Percent In Three Months

This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E increased twenty percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are overvalued and/or recording lower profits that are becoming more overvalued. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming overvalued before the price drops. This list should be sent between a medium to low frequency of emails each day.

P/E Change 30 Percent Increase
P/E Increases 30 Percent In Three Months

This threshold is reached when a stock's P/E increased thirty percent or more over the past three months. P/E changes fairly slowly with earnings only recorded each quarter. This list targets companies that are becoming grossly overvalued and/or their company is failing by not making money. This list will help long term traders to be notified if a stock is becoming overvalued before the price drops. This list should be sent between a low frequency of emails each day.

Daily Volume Over Shares Available

The daily volume of a stock is a calculation of how many individual shares are being traded over the current day. Stocks have a total amount of shares that could ever be bought called the total shares available. When daily volume is divided by shares available, it shows how much volume there is compared to the amount that is possible. As demand is a key factor of the market, large profits are to be made with small cap stocks experiencing large amounts of daily volume.

50% Daily Volume Over Shares Available
50% Daily Volume Over Shares Available

This threshold is reached when a stock has a daily volume over shares available equal to fifty percent. This targets companies that are experiencing more demand than supply in the market and might indicate a future increase in the company's stock price. When the daily volume over shares available of a company increases, the this indicates that there is a continuing demand for the stock and a small supply. This list should send a high frequency of emails each day.

100% Daily Volume Over Shares Available
100% Daily Volume Over Shares Available

This threshold is reached when a stock has a daily volume over shares available equal to one hundred percent. This targets companies that are experiencing equal demand compared supply in the market and might indicate a future increase in the company's stock price. When the daily volume over shares available of a company increases, the this indicates that there is a continuing demand for the stock and a small supply. This list should send a high to medium frequency of emails each day.

item.title: Stock Search
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded: Stock search is a one stop shop for all of the information on the stock market. Just search for a company name or stock ticker and our database will pull all relevant fields of information. With all the information, you can make the most profitable decisions for your strategy.

item.title: Personalized Stock Finder
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded: Input your criteria in the fields, and our algorithm will filter the market for stocks that meet your options. This feature returns those stocks in a chart and include additional fields including the percent change today, volume today, average volume as well as others. More information about each returned stock can be retrieved using our stock search.

item.title: Terms and conditions
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded:
Terms and Conditions for Retail Trade Scanner
Effective Date: 12/30/2024
These Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) govern your use of Retail Trade Scanner (“Website,” “we,” “us,” or “our”). By accessing or using the Website, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, you may not use the Website.

  1. General Use
    1.1 Eligibility: You must be at least 18 years old to use this Website. By using the Website, you confirm that you meet this age requirement.
    1.2 Purpose: Retail Trade Scanner provides stock scanning tools, market data, and related information for informational and educational purposes only.
  2. No Financial or Investment Advice
    2.1 Disclaimer: Retail Trade Scanner does not provide investment, legal, or tax advice. All content is for informational purposes only.
    2.2 Risks: Investing in stocks carries risks. You should consult a licensed financial advisor before making any investment decisions.
  3. User Obligations
    3.1 Accuracy of Information: You are responsible for providing accurate and complete information when using Retail Trade Scanner.
    3.2 Prohibited Conduct: You agree not to:
    • Use the Website for illegal activities.
    • Distribute or transmit harmful software.
    • Reverse engineer or attempt to extract the Website’s source code.
  4. Subscription and Fees
    4.1 Free and Paid Plans: Certain features of Retail Trade Scanner may require a subscription. The terms of your subscription, including fees, will be disclosed during signup.
    4.2 Payment: Payments are non-refundable unless otherwise stated.
    4.3 Changes: We reserve the right to modify subscription plans and fees.
  5. Intellectual Property
    5.1 Ownership: All content on Retail Trade Scanner, including text, graphics, software, and trademarks, is our property or licensed to us.
    5.2 License: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use Retail Trade Scanner for personal, non-commercial purposes.
  6. Limitation of Liability
    6.1 No Guarantees: We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the information provided by Retail Trade Scanner.
    6.2 Liability Cap: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages resulting from your use of Retail Trade Scanner.
  7. Privacy
    Your use of Retail Trade Scanner is subject to our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
  8. Termination
    We may suspend or terminate your access to Retail Trade Scanner at any time for violations of these Terms or other reasons, with or without notice.
  9. Changes to Terms
    We may update these Terms from time to time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the Website. Continued use of Retail Trade Scanner constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.
  10. Governing Law
    These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Indiana, without regard to its conflict of laws principles. Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms or your use of the Website will be resolved exclusively in the state or federal courts located in Indiana.
  11. Contact Us
    If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at Admin@retailtradescanner.com.
    Acknowledgment: By using Retail Trade Scanner, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms and Conditions.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: user04170346476890
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy for Retail Trade Scanner
Effective Date: [Insert Date]
Retail Trade Scanner (“we,” “us,” or “our”) values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, Insert Website URL. By using the Website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

  1. Information We Collect
    1.1 Personal Information
    We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as:
    • Name
    • Email address
    • Billing information (if applicable)
    • Account details (if applicable)
    1.2 Non-Personal Information
    We automatically collect certain non-personal information when you visit the Website, including:
    • IP address
    • Browser type
    • Operating system
    • Pages visited and time spent on the Website
    • Referral source
    1.3 Cookies and Tracking Technologies
    We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
  2. How We Use Your Information
    We use the collected information for the following purposes:
    • To provide and improve the Website’s features and services.
    • To process payments and manage subscriptions.
    • To send newsletters, updates, or promotional materials (you can opt-out at any time).
    • To monitor and analyze Website usage and trends.
    • To comply with legal obligations.
  3. How We Share Your Information
    We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances:
    • Service Providers: We may share information with third-party vendors who assist us in operating the Website (e.g., payment processors, hosting providers).
    • Legal Compliance: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety.
    • Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, sale, or acquisition, your information may be transferred to the new owner.
  4. Data Security
    We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
  5. Your Rights
    Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
    • Access: Request access to the personal information we hold about you.
    • Correction: Request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information.
    • Deletion: Request the deletion of your personal information, subject to legal and contractual obligations.
    • Opt-Out: Opt-out of receiving marketing communications.
    To exercise these rights, please contact us at [Insert Contact Information].
  6. Third-Party Links
    Our Website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those websites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.
  7. Children’s Privacy
    Retail Trade Scanner does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will delete it promptly.
  8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
    We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the Website. Your continued use of the Website constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
  9. Contact Us
    If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
    [Insert Contact Information]
    Acknowledgment: By using Retail Trade Scanner, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.
